swayambhu_stupa.name: Swayambhu Crystal Stupa
swayambhu_stupa.description: An ancient stupa atop a hill, radiating mystical energy. The crystal dome captures moonlight and transforms it into healing waves.

inner_sanctum.name: Inner Sanctum of Enlightenment
inner_sanctum.description: A sacred chamber within the Swayambhu Stupa, where ancient meditation techniques and cosmic wisdom are preserved.

crystal_meditation_hall.name: Crystal Meditation Hall
crystal_meditation_hall.description: A tranquil hall lined with resonating crystals that amplify meditative states and spiritual insights.

meditation_gardens.name: Himalayan Meditation Gardens
meditation_gardens.description: Terraced gardens where monks cultivate rare mystical herbs and practice walking meditation amid floating prayer flags.

herb_sanctuary.name: Mystical Herb Sanctuary
herb_sanctuary.description: A carefully tended garden of rare Himalayan medicinal and magical plants, each with unique metaphysical properties.

alchemist_workshop.name: Himalayan Alchemist Workshop
alchemist_workshop.description: A mysterious workshop where ancient alchemical traditions blend with mystical mountain wisdom to create extraordinary elixirs.

zen_waterfall.name: Zen Waterfall Sanctuary
zen_waterfall.description: A cascading waterfall where water spirits dance and meditative energies flow like liquid crystal.

spirit_caves.name: Himalayan Spirit Caves
spirit_caves.description: Ancient caves where mountain spirits and ethereal beings communicate with enlightened practitioners.

ancestor_chamber.name: Chamber of Ancestral Echoes
ancestor_chamber.description: A sacred cavern where the memories and wisdom of ancient mountain sages are preserved in crystalline formations.

mountain_monastery.name: Floating Mountain Monastery
mountain_monastery.description: A monastery that seemingly defies gravity, suspended between mountain peaks and clouds, accessible only by mystical means.

prayer_wheel_hall.name: Infinite Prayer Wheel Hall
prayer_wheel_hall.description: A massive hall filled with enchanted prayer wheels that generate cosmic energies with each rotation.

levitation_terrace.name: Levitation Meditation Terrace
levitation_terrace.description: An open-air platform where advanced monks practice the art of gravitational transcendence.

wind_rider_sanctuary.name: Wind Rider's Sanctuary
wind_rider_sanctuary.description: A sacred space where mystical practitioners commune with air spirits and learn to navigate ethereal wind currents.

cloudweaver_hall.name: Cloudweaver Hall of Secrets
cloudweaver_hall.description: A mysterious chamber where cloud spirits are summoned and their ancient knowledge is decoded.

himalayan_nexus.name: Himalayan Mystical Nexus
himalayan_nexus.description: A convergence point of magical ley lines, where the energies of the mountains are most concentrated and powerful.

energy_convergence_chamber.name: Energy Convergence Chamber
energy_convergence_chamber.description: The heart of the Himalayan Nexus, where magical energies from different realms are balanced and harmonized.

dragon_spine_mountains.name: Dragon Spine Mountain Range
dragon_spine_mountains.description: A treacherous mountain range where ancient dragon spirits are said to slumber beneath the rocky peaks.

dragon_spirit_caverns.name: Dragon Spirit Caverns
dragon_spirit_caverns.description: Massive underground caverns where the essence of ancient mountain dragons is preserved in crystalline formations.

eternal_snow_realm.name: Eternal Snow Realm
eternal_snow_realm.description: A mystical dimension where time stands still and snow spirits weave intricate patterns of frost and memory.

snowspirit_citadel.name: Snowspirit Citadel
snowspirit_citadel.description: The ethereal fortress of the snow spirits, constructed entirely of living ice that shifts and changes with their emotions.

magical_trade_bazaar.name: Magical Trade Bazaar of the Peaks
magical_trade_bazaar.description: A hidden marketplace where mystics, traders, and magical beings from different realms exchange rare artifacts and knowledge.

artifact_exchange_hall.name: Artifact Exchange Hall
artifact_exchange_hall.description: A grand hall within the Magical Trade Bazaar where the most extraordinary and powerful magical artifacts are traded.

primordial_observatory.name: Primordial Mountain Observatory
primordial_observatory.description: An ancient astronomical site where the first stargazers of the Himalayas mapped celestial movements and cosmic energies.
